	var sc_currentPageHashValue = '8328d2a2';
	var sc_template = 'Deloitte_Insights_Branded_Landing_Page_Template';
	var sc_recCuratedPromos = '';
	var sc_recommArticle = 'Recommendations';
	var sc_recViewedPage = 'Recently viewed pages';
	var sc_featuredLink = 'Featured Link';
	var sc_channel = '/content/www/us/en/insights';    
	var hideFromRecommendations_v2 = 'false';
	var pagePathValue = '/us/en/insights/deloitte-insights-magazine';
	var selectorString = '.';
	var siteSectionOverrideVal = '';
	var PAGE_NAME = "";
	var GOOGLE_MF_ACCOUNT = "";
	var GOOGLE_INCLUDE_GLOBAL = "";
	var RESULTS_FOR_LBL = "";
	var sc_secondLevelForProp5 = "";
	var temp_Name = 'di-branded-landing-template';
	var isTempSite = false;        
	var sc_secondLevel = "";
	var sc_thirdLevel = '';
	var sc_country = 'us';
	var sc_language = 'en';
	var siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'insights';	
	var sc_mfCountry = '';
	var sc_GatedOverlayEnabled = 'false';
	var sc_mfSite = 'Deloitte';
	var sc_gigyaId = "";
	
	if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && (siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() == 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5='';
	}else if((siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() != 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5 = siteSectionOverrideVal.toLowerCase().trim();
	}else if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length == 0){
		if(temp_Name == 'genericerrorpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = '404_error';
		}
		else if(temp_Name == 'nonsupportedpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'not_supported';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'rfpformpage') || (temp_Name == 'contactuspage')|| (temp_Name == 'deloitteformstemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'forms';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'searchResultsTemplate') || (temp_Name == 'internalSearchResultsTemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'search_results';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'officedetailspage') || (temp_Name == 'officelocatorpage')|| (temp_Name == 'globalofficedirectorypage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'office_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'companyinformationpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'legal';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'moreondeloittepage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'company_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'pressreleasespagetemplate'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'press_releases';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'fulltopicpage') || (temp_Name == 'articlepage')|| (temp_Name == 'solutionpage')|| (temp_Name == 'eventpage')|| (temp_Name == 'careerpage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 ='insights';
		}else if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {              
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'home';
		}else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'thank_you';
		}else if(temp_Name == "dynamiclisttemplate") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'dynamiclist';
		}else if(temp_Name == "htmlfragmentpage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'landingpage';
		}else if(temp_Name == "blog-collection-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog_collection';
        }else if(temp_Name == "blog-post-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog-post';
		}
	}       

	if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {
		 sc_channel = 'Homepage';
	} else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
	   sc_channel = 'Thankyou';
	}
	sc_secondLevelForProp5 = siteOverrideValueProp5;
	searchLocation = '//www2.deloitte.com/us/en/misc/search.html';

	try{
		if(sessionStorage.getItem("gigyaIdInSession")!=null){
			sc_gigyaId=sessionStorage.getItem("gigyaIdInSession");
   		 }
	}
	catch(err){console.log(err);}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	 function loadScript(scriptURL){
        // load script
        var scriptTAG = document.createElement('script');
        scriptTAG.type = 'application/javascript';
        scriptTAG.async = true;
        scriptTAG.src = scriptURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(scriptTAG);
      }

      function loadCSS(CSSURL){
        // load css
        var linkTAG = document.createElement('link');
        linkTAG.rel = "stylesheet";
        linkTAG.type = 'text/css';
        linkTAG.href = CSSURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(linkTAG);
      }
      if(!navigator.onLine){
      	loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.css');
        loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site.min.css');
        loadScript('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.js');
      	templateType = dataLayer.page.attributes.pageTemplate;
        // for event details template
      	if(templateType == "Event_Details_Page_Template"){
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-event-details.min.css');
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-event-details.min.css');
      	}
        // for blog post template
      	else if(templateType == "Blog_Post_Template"){

      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-blog-post.min.css')
      	}
        // for DI Article and multimedia
        else if(templateType == "Deloitte_Insights_Article_And_Multimedia_Template"){
          loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/deloitte-insights/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-di-insights-and-multimedia.min.css');

      <section id="editor-letter" class="section_animate_element">
        <div class="container w-100">
          <div class="el-container el-xl-container is-open d-lg-block d-none">
            <div class="row">
              <div class="col-12 letter-xl-top">
                <h3>Letter from the editor</h3>
                <button id="btn-close-letter" class="btn-close-letter is-open" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" tabindex="0" title="" aria-label="Close" data-analytics-label="letter-from-the-editor:close" data-original-title="Close">
                  <span></span><span></span><span></span>
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="letter-row row">
              <div class="col-2">
                <img src="https://www2.deloitte.com/etc/insights-lists/interactives/2022/may/di-magazine/assets/Elisabeth_Sulivan_Final_2.png" class="img-fluid mb-10" alt="letter from editor Elisabeth Sulivan">
                <h4>Elisabeth Sullivan</h4>
                <h6>
                  Editor in chief,<br>
                  Deloitte Insights
                </h6>
              </div>
              <div class="col-lg-5 px-2">
                <p>
                  Artificial intelligence has gone from a fringe technology to what many consider to be must-have, market-making and
                  -shaping tech. And with each passing day, the AI conversation is evolving in real time, spurred on, of course, by all
                  things generative-AI–related and the more readily apparent impact AI could have on organizations, industries, and
                  economies.
                  <br><br>
                  In this issue, we’re featuring some of Deloitte’s latest proprietary research and insights to help move the AI
                  conversation forward, offering fresh perspectives and foresight on what those organizational and economic impacts might
                  be.
                </p>
              </div>
              <div class="col-lg-5 px-2">
                <p>
                  We look at what it takes to scale from gen AI pilots to full implementation, which success metrics business and tech
                  leaders turn to when determining the impact of their AI investments, what AI’s potential impact on work and the workforce
                  might be, how prepared organizations feel for the associated risk and governance issues, and much more.
                  <br><br>
                  Read on.
                </p>

              <p>
                Artificial intelligence has gone from a fringe technology to what many consider to be must-have, market-making and -shaping
                tech. And with each passing day, the AI conversation is evolving in real time, spurred on, of course, by all things
                generative-AI–related and the more readily apparent impact AI can and will have on organizations, industries, and economies.
              </p>
              <br><br>
              <p>
                In this issue, we’re featuring some of Deloitte’s latest proprietary research and insights to help move the AI conversation
                forward, offering fresh perspectives and foresight on what those organizational and economic impacts might be. We look at

        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        optionalProperties += "<div class='form_leftcolmark'> </div>";
        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        optionalProperties += "<div class='form_rightcol'>";
        optionalProperties += "<div class='form_rightcol_wrapper'>";
        optionalProperties += "<textarea id='additionalcomments' name='additionalcomments' rows='5'></textarea>";
        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        optionalProperties += "<div class='form_row_description'></div>";
        optionalProperties += "</div>";
        $(optionalProperties).insertAfter("#section-country-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup");
      }

      // custom question prompt

      if (
        elqFormCustomQuestionPrompt.substring(0, 1) == " " ||
        elqFormCustomQuestionPrompt.substring(0, 2) == "${" ||
        elqFormCustomQuestionPrompt.length === 0
      ) {
        elqFormCustomQuestionPrompt = "";
      } else {
        var customQuestionProperties = "";
        {
          customQuestionProperties += "<!-- custom question -->";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='text section' id='section-custom-question-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup'>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_row'>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_leftcol'>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_leftcollabel'>";

          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_leftcolmark'></div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_rightcol'>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_rightcol_wrapper'>";
          customQuestionProperties +=
            "<input type='text' class='form_field form_field_text' id='customquestionanswer-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup' name='dcom_form_custom_question_answer' value='' maxlength='80' size='20' required>";
          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "<div class='form_row_description'></div>";
          customQuestionProperties += "</div>";

          $(customQuestionProperties).insertAfter("#section-country-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup");
        }

      if (elqFormCheckBoxPrompt.substring(0, 1) == " " || elqFormCheckBoxPrompt.substring(0, 2) == "${" || elqFormCheckBoxPrompt.length === 0) {
        elqFormCheckBoxPrompt = "";
      } else {
        var customCheckboxProperties = "";
        {
          customCheckboxProperties += "<!-- custom checkbox -->";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='text section' id='section-checkboxes-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup'>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='form_row'>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='form_leftcol'>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='form_leftcollabel'>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<label for='customcheckboxprompt'>" + elqFormCheckBoxPrompt + "</label>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "</div>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "</div>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "</div>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='form_leftcolmark'></div>";
          customCheckboxProperties += "<div class='form_rightcol'>";

          $(document).ready(function () {

          });
          // var customcheckboxlist = ["${eloqua-form-checkbox-options}"];
          var checkboxitem = document.getElementById("customcheckboxes-insights-magazine-newsletter-signup");
          var checkbox = "",
            label = "",
            linebreak = "",
            checkBoxOptionItems = elqFormCheckBoxOptions.split("|"),
            boxcap = "";
          if (checkBoxOptionItems.length > 10) {
            var boxCap = 10;
          } else {
            boxCap = checkBoxOptionItems.length;
          }
          for (var i = 0; i < boxCap; i++) {
            checkBox = document.createElement("input");
            label = document.createElement("label");
            linebreak = document.createElement("br");
            label.classList.add("form_row_checkbox");
            checkBox.type = "checkbox";
            checkBox.name = "customcheckbox";
            checkBox.value = checkBoxOptionItems[i].replaceAll(" ", "_");

          i;
        for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {

            return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : sParameterName[1];
          }
        }
      };

    function getCookie(name) 
    {
        var dc = document.cookie;
        var prefix = name + "=";
        var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
        if (begin == -1) {
            begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
            if (begin != 0) return null;
        }
        else
        {
            begin += 2;
            var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
            if (end == -1) {
                end = dc.length;
            }
        }
        return unescape(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
    }
